name: In re CONSTABLE OF NEW WASHINGTON BOROUGH. Appeal of Peter HENRY
name_abbreviation: In re Constable of New Washington Borough

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1801, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: In re CONSTABLE OF NEW WASHINGTON BOROUGH. Appeal of Peter HENRY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Clearfield County AFFIRMED.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1801, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: ORDER PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Daniel C. Bell, Bell, Silverblatt & Swoope, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
645 A.2d 1309
In re CONSTABLE OF NEW WASHINGTON BOROUGH. Appeal of Peter HENRY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted June 27, 1994.
Decided Aug. 25, 1994.
Peter Henry, pro se. .
John R. Carfley, for appellant.
Daniel C. Bell, Bell, Silverblatt & Swoope, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
